com.verilion.database
Class Menu

java.lang.Object
  com.verilion.database.Menu
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatabaseInterface
public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseInterface

Manipulates menu table in db, and permits retrieval of menus for display (so it touches menu_item and menu item detail as well)

package com.verilion.database

Author:
tsawler
